page.title: 18BANSTEAD ROAD CHAPEL
page.content: {This chapel was built in 1962 and was {dedicated on the 30th April, 1962.}It cost Â£30,000 to build. Before it was built the builders checked the ground for old graves. {The chapel belongs to the Mormons. They do not drink or smoke or watch films with swearing in them. They do not have collections in their church, but instead give one tenth of their earnings to the church each year. Only the caretaker of the chapel is paid. All the rest of the money goes to poor people or to building chapels in other places. {When the chapel was built a workman {found part of a skull.}It was discovered to be that of a Saxon and was preserved in flint. A knife, brooch, shield and sword were also found with the body.
